title: Smooth deliveries on New Years eve? Zomato, Swiggy hike payout to gig workers
content: Zomato and Swiggy are increasing incentives for delivery partners on New Year's Eve. This comes as gig workers plan a nationwide strike on December 31, 2025. Unions are demanding better pay and working conditions. The strike aims to disrupt services during a busy period. Workers seek restoration of old payout structures and removal of 10-minute delivery.

title: EAM attends Khaleda Zia's funeral; hands PM Modi‚Äôs letter to son Tarique
content: India's external affairs minister S Jaishankar conveyed Prime Minister Modi's condolences to BNP Acting Chairman Tarique Rahman in Dhaka following the passing of former PM Begum Khaleda Zia. Jaishankar highlighted Zia's significant influence on India-Bangladesh ties and expressed optimism for future partnership development. India is officially participating in the funeral rites.

title: Khaleda Zia‚Äôs funeral: Thousands gather in Dhaka to pay last respects ‚Äî live updates
content: Bangladesh mourns the passing of former Prime Minister Khaleda Zia, a pivotal political figure, with a public holiday and three days of state mourning. Thousands gathered for her funeral in Dhaka, attended by regional leaders including India's external affairs minister S Jaishankar. Her death marks the end of an era for the influential BNP chairperson.

title: 'Skills, patience and passion exemplary': PM Modi on Arjun Erigaisi's World Blitz bronze
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi congratulated Grandmaster Arjun Erigaisi for winning bronze at the World Blitz Championships in Doha. Erigaisi's achievement, following his World Rapid bronze, highlights India's growing prowess in chess. The Prime Minister lauded Erigaisi's skills and passion, stating his success will inspire the youth.

title: 'World stands with you, Matto': Damien Martyn in induced coma, battles meningitis
content: Damien ‚Äã‚Äã‚ÄãMartyn was also part of Australia‚Äôs triumphant 2003 ODI World Cup squad, playing a decisive role in the final against India with an unbeaten 88 in a match-winning partnership with Ricky Ponting. ‚Äã‚Äã‚ÄãHe retired from international cricket in 2006 during the Ashes series and has largely kept a low profile since.

title: Neuralink and parenting: Meta AI chief Alexandr Wang on kids; will wait until Neuralink advances
content: Meta's AI head, Alexandr Wang, revealed he will delay having children until advanced brain-computer interface (BCI) technology like Neuralink is widely available. Wang believes children's early neuroplasticity offers a prime window for intuitive BCI integration, potentially enabling future generations to learn and utilize superintelligence tools more effectively than adults.

title: Happy New Year 2026: 30+ Wishes, images, greetings, quotes and more
content: As 2025 concludes, the article offers a collection of greetings, wishes, and quotes to celebrate the arrival of 2026. It provides various ways to express hope, joy, and new beginnings for loved ones and social media. The content aims to make the transition into the new year special for everyone.

title: Gurgaon-Faridabad road: Woman gang-raped, assaulted & thrown out of moving van; gets 12 stitches on face
content: A 25-year-old woman was allegedly raped and assaulted by two men after accepting a lift in a van on the Gurgaon-Faridabad road. She was held captive for nearly three hours and then thrown from the moving vehicle, sustaining severe facial injuries. Police have detained two suspects following a complaint.

title: New Year alert in Rajasthan: 150kg explosives, batteries and wires seized from car; 2 arrested
content: Police intercepted a car on the Tonk‚ÄìJaipur highway, seizing approximately 150kg of ammonium nitrate hidden in urea sacks. Also recovered were 200 explosive batteries and 1,100 meters of electric wire. Two men, identified as Surendra and Surendra Mochi, were detained for questioning regarding the chemical's origin and intended use.

title: Aadhaar‚ÄìPAN linking deadline ends today: How to link, penalty and other details
content: Linking your PAN card with Aadhaar is crucial to avoid penalties. The Income Tax department's portal guides you through a simple online process involving your PAN and Aadhaar numbers, followed by an OTP verification. Failure to link by December 31, 2025, will render your PAN inoperative, impacting tax refunds and leading to higher tax deductions and collections.

title: Faridabad woman gang-raped in moving van: 2 accused arrested; Maruti Eco seized
content: Two men have been arrested in connection with the alleged gang rape and assault of a 25-year-old woman in Gurgaon. The victim was reportedly held for three hours in a moving van and then thrown out with severe injuries. Police seized the vehicle and registered an FIR following a complaint from the victim's family.

title: Water contamination kills 3 in Indore: Hospitals see rush of patients
content: Three people died in Indore's Bhagirathpura area after consuming contaminated water, with over 15,000 residents affected by diarrhoea and vomiting. The contamination was traced to a newly constructed toilet dumping waste into a sinkhole above a water supply line joint. Authorities are flushing pipelines and supplying water via tankers while investigating the incident.

title: ‚ÄòToo drunk to walk? We‚Äôll drop you home‚Äô: Karnataka plans rescue drops for New Year
content: Karnataka government will provide transport for heavily intoxicated individuals to their homes on New Year's Eve, with 15 resting locations set up. Special attention is being given to women's safety and preventing drink-driving, with over 20,000 police personnel deployed across the state.

title: End of online exam: World‚Äôs largest accounting body scraps online tests; unable to halt cheating‚Äô
content: The Association of Chartered Certified Accountants (ACCA) will cease offering online exams for most students from March 2026, citing a rise in sophisticated cheating methods. This decision follows concerns raised by the Financial Reporting Council about cheating in professional exams, with instances found even among top accounting firms.

title: How to get access to Gemini Pro, ChatGPT Go and Perplexity for free
content: Leading tech giants are making advanced AI tools accessible in India. Google, in partnership with Jio, offers Gemini Pro free for 18 months. Airtel customers receive a 12-month Perplexity Pro subscription at no cost. OpenAI is also providing ChatGPT Go free for 12 months to eligible Indian users, significantly expanding AI access nationwide.

title: 'Dhurandhar' box office collection day 27 Vs 'Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri' day 7
content: Ranveer Singh's 'Dhurandhar' continues its phenomenal run, crossing Rs 715 crore by its 27th day. In stark contrast, Kartik Aaryan and Ananya Panday's 'Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri,' released on Christmas, struggles significantly, failing to reach Rs 30 crore even after its first week. The spy thriller's success overshadows the romantic comedy's performance.

title: Trailing a scream, cops foil suicide, save youth; to be rewarded
content: Two beat officers in Patel Nagar responded to a woman's screams, discovering her son attempting suicide. They raced upstairs, forced open a locked door, and found the young man hanging. The officers quickly cut him down, saving his life just in time before he was rushed to the hospital.

title: Jerrssis Wadia: Tipped as 'next Travis Head', shipped to Adelaide from Vadodara | Exclusive
content: Watched by Tim Paine in a T10 tournament in Melbourne, Indian-origin batter Jerrssis Wadia‚Äôs fearless hitting has fast-tracked his rise in Australian cricket. From losing his U-19 years to COVID to smashing a 16-ball 34 in the BBL, the Mumbai-born 24-year-old is now tipped as the 'Next Travis Head' in South Australia.

title: 'Weakened negotiating position': Cong demands clarity on China's role in Op Sindoor
content: Congress has questioned the Centre's silence after China claimed to have mediated between India and Pakistan during the May tensions. Leader Jairam Ramesh stated China's claim contradicts India's stance and undermines national security, especially given China's alignment with Pakistan.

title: Investment planning: Stocks, FDs, gold, crypto & more ‚Äî your smart money guide to 2026
content: Financial assets in 2026 will be shaped by central bank actions and trade deal prospects, amidst expected volatility. Investors should approach stocks with caution, while gold and silver are poised for continued gains. Mutual funds are set to cross $1tn AUM, and bond yields may rise.

title: India's future XI: Meet the young talents eyeing Olympic glory
content: India's sporting future shines bright as a new generation of athletes emerges, poised for the 2028 Los Angeles Olympics. Boxers Hitesh Gulia and Jaismine Lamboria, long jumper Shaili Singh, and shooter Suruchi Phogat are among the promising talents making waves.

title: 'Remove 10 mins delivery option': Gig workers launch nationwide strike on New Year's Eve
content: Gig workers are demanding the removal of 10-minute delivery options and the reinstatement of earlier payout structures ahead of a nationwide strike. Thousands of workers are participating, citing unsafe pressure and reduced earnings due to changes in payment systems and algorithm-driven management. The protest, organized by IFAT, aims to address these concerns and secure social security benefits.

title: Spanish grape-eating ritual: Can eating 12 grapes on New Year‚Äôs Eve bring love, luck in 2026?
content: A Spanish New Year's Eve tradition, 'Las Doce Uvas de la Suerte,' involves eating 12 grapes at midnight for good fortune. This custom, originating in late 1800s Madrid, has a modern social media twist: eating grapes under the table for amplified luck and manifesting love, luck, and prosperity.  Pop culture and viral stories highlight its perceived effectiveness.

title: Samajwadi Party leader Amrendra Nishad shot by cousin; accused held
content: Samajwadi Party leader Amrendra Nishad narrowly escaped an assassination attempt by his cousin, Ravindra Nishad, who allegedly fired a shot at him at his Gorakhpur residence. The bullet missed Nishad's chest, and the accused has been taken into custody. Investigations are underway following the incident.

title: Kennedy Center row: Name change to Trump prompts concert cancellations; artists pull out
content: Renaming the Kennedy Center to include Donald Trump's name has sparked artist cancellations, including the jazz ensemble The Cookers.  Critics deem the move illegal and damaging to JFK's legacy. Trump allies, now controlling the board, dismiss the boycotts as politically driven, while some artists cite racism and cultural destruction as reasons for their withdrawal.

title: British Indian high achievers recognised in King‚Äôs New Year Honours
content: Several individuals of South Asian heritage have been recognized in the King's New Year Honours List 2026 for significant community contributions. Notable recipients include Meera Syal and Meena Upadhyaya, who received damehoods. The list also features CBEs, OBEs, and MBEs awarded to those making a difference in charity, business, education, and the arts.

title: Haryana horror : Suitcase with woman‚Äôs body found on roadside
content: A disturbing discovery was made in Haryana's Kaithal district as a woman's body was found stuffed inside a blue suitcase in a drain. Farmers alerted authorities after noticing dogs with the luggage. The unidentified victim, believed to be around 30, showed signs of strangulation.

title: 'What's happening in B'desh can happen in India too': Hindu Raksha Dal members hand out 250+ swords
content: Ghaziabad police have registered an FIR against Pinky Chaudhary of Hindu Raksha Dal and 45 associates for allegedly distributing swords and weapons in Shalimar Garden. Ten members were arrested, while Chaudhary and others fled. The incident caused fear and disrupted public peace, with police recovering numerous weapons. Chaudhary cited security concerns for Hindus as justification.

title: Sexual assault case in Canada: Catholic priest from Kerala arrested
content: A Catholic priest from Kerala, Fr. James Cherickal, serving in Toronto, has been arrested in Canada on charges of sexual assault and sexual interference. Peel Regional Police laid the charges on December 18. The Archdiocese of Toronto has removed him from pastoral ministry, emphasizing his innocence until proven guilty and entitlement to due process.

title: Assam couple burnt alive on witchcraft suspicion; villagers claim they caused harm
content: A couple was brutally attacked and burnt alive in their home in Assam's Karbi Anglong district by villagers who suspected them of practicing witchcraft. Police are investigating the horrific incident, which highlights the deep-rooted superstition prevalent in the area. Witch hunting is a criminal offense under state law.

title: Australia cricket great Damien Martyn in induced coma
content: Former Australian cricketer Damien Martyn has been hospitalised and placed in an induced coma after being diagnosed with meningitis. The 54-year-old, a prominent player for Australia in Tests and ODIs, fell ill on Boxing Day. Friends and former teammates have sent their well wishes and prayers for his recovery.

title: Silver price crash today: White metal plunges Rs 15,000 ‚Äî what's the outlook?
content: Precious metals concluded 2025 with a retreat as investors locked in profits near record highs. Silver futures saw a significant 6% drop, while gold futures also edged lower. Despite the late pullback, both metals are poised for historic annual gains, supported by geopolitical tensions but potentially capped by Fed rate cut expectations.

title: Aviation milestone: Dhruv-NG civilian helicopter completes 1st flight in Bengaluru
content: Hindustan Aeronautics Limited's new Advanced Light Helicopter Dhruv-NG successfully completed its inaugural flight in Bengaluru, signaling a significant stride for India's civil aviation manufacturing. This upgraded, twin-engine helicopter boasts enhanced safety, performance, and passenger comfort, powered by indigenous Shakti engines.  The milestone flight aims to boost civil and export markets, with extensive testing planned.

title: Pakistan: Asim Munir marries daughter to brother‚Äôs son; top officials in attendance
content: Pakistan army chief Asim Munir's daughter recently married her cousin, Abdul Rehman, in a subdued ceremony in Rawalpindi. The event saw attendance from top political and military figures, including the President and PM.

title: Zelenskyy says allies can 'verify' Putin home attack 'was fake'
content: Ukraine said Tuesday there was no "plausible" evidence it launched a drone attack on one of Russian President Vladimir Putin's residences, accusing Moscow of peddling falsehoods to manipulate talks on ending the war. It also said the Russian army had chosen "how, when and where" to retaliate against Ukraine, and that Moscow would now "toughen" its negotiating position in talks to end Europe's worst conflict since World War Two.

title: NRI dies after pistol in waist misfires in Punjab
content: A tragic accident claimed the life of Harwinder Singh, an NRI who had recently returned home, in Fazilka's Dhani Sucha Singh village. A pistol tucked in his waist accidentally discharged as he stood up, striking him fatally. The incident, captured on CCTV, led to his death en route to a hospital. Local leaders expressed sorrow for the family's loss.

title: Telangana man digs his grave beside wife‚Äôs resting place; calls it 'final home'
content: An 80-year-old man in Jagtial district has dug his own granite grave, costing Rs 12 lakh, to avoid burdening his children. Nakka Indrayya, who spent 45 years in Dubai's construction, visits and tends to his resting place daily, finding peace in his preparations for death.

title: 'To build peace that lasts': After Trump, China claims credit for mediating India-Pak conflict
content: China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi claimed Beijing mediated the India-Pakistan standoff in May following the Pahalgam terror attack. This assertion comes despite India's consistent dismissal of third-party mediation, stating the conflict was resolved through direct military-to-military communication after Pakistan's DGMO requested a ceasefire.

title: Gold price prediction: What‚Äôs the outlook for gold, silver prices? What you should know
content: Gold price prediction today: Maneesh Sharma of Anand Rathi Shares and Stock Brokers is of the view that gold and silver prices are set for the best annual performances in several years.

title: Uttarakhand: 2 loco trains collide in Vishnugad-Pipalkoti hydroelectric project; 60 injured
content: A collision between two trains inside the Pipalkoti tunnel of the Vishnugad‚ÄìPipalkoti Hydroelectric Project has left approximately 60 people injured. A loco train carrying workers and officials struck a goods train, with 109 individuals on board. All injured have been rescued and are in stable condition. The incident occurred within the project area, being developed by THDC (India).

title: Will NSE and BSE remain closed or open for trading on Jan 1, 2026?
content: Indian stock markets, NSE and BSE, will remain open on January 1, 2026, offering a rare trading opportunity as global exchanges close for New Year celebrations. The NSE has also unveiled its 2026 holiday calendar, detailing 15 trading closures throughout the year, including major festivals and national holidays.

title: The Berlin visa trap: Why Indian students are being asked to leave despite being enrolled
content: Hundreds of Indian students at a private Berlin university face deportation as their residence permits are not being renewed. Authorities deemed their hybrid study programmes, combining online and limited in-person classes, insufficient for a student visa under German law. This ruling leaves many mid-degree, facing significant financial losses and academic uncertainty.

title: Bank holiday on New Year: Will banks remain closed on Dec 31 & Jan 1? Check list
content: As 2025 concludes, Indian banks will observe varied closures on December 31 and January 1. Mizoram and Arunachal Pradesh will shut on New Year's Eve, while several other states, including Tamil Nadu and West Bengal, will close on January 1 for New Year's Day and local festivals. Digital banking remains accessible for essential transactions.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens above 26,000; BSE Sensex up over 200 points
content: Stock market today: Indian equity benchmark indices, Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, rallied strongly in trade on Wednesday. While Nifty50 went above 26,150, BSE Sensex surged over 650 points.

title: Neerja Modi School suicide case: CBSE cites 'gross violations of child safety norms'; withdraws affiliation
content: The CBSE has revoked Neerja Modi School's affiliation up to senior secondary level following a 9-year-old student's death due to alleged gross violations of child safety norms. The board cited a complete failure in the school's counselling and grievance redressal systems, deeming the environment unsafe.

title: Pats' Diggs faces strangulation, assault charges
content: Patriots wide receiver Stefon Diggs is facing a felony charge of strangulation and a misdemeanor charge of assault from alleged Dec. 2 incident.

title: Cowboys release two-time Pro Bowl CB Diggs
content: The Cowboys have released cornerback Trevon Diggs. He will become a free agent if he goes unclaimed on waivers.

title: Seals, in first start for TCU, leads OT win vs. USC
content: Ken Seals passed for 258 yards and the winning touchdown to Jeremy Payne in overtime as TCU rallied to beat No. 16 USC 30-27 on Tuesday night in the Alamo Bowl.

title: Edgecombe's last-second 3 propels Sixers in OT
content: Rookie VJ Edgecombe rewarded the Sixers' faith in him by connecting on a tiebreaking 25-foot jumper with 1.7 seconds left, lifting Philadelphia to a 139-136 win over the Grizzlies.

title: NCAA clarifies eligibility stance amid criticism
content: President Charlie Baker clarified the NCAA's position on college eligibility for players with NBA experience Tuesday, saying "it has not and will not grant eligibility to any prospective or returning student-athletes who have signed an NBA contract."

title: CMC misses Tue. practice ahead of Seahawks tilt
content: Niners star Christian McCaffrey missed Tuesday's practice with a stiff back, while left tackle Trent Williams nursed a right hamstring injury ahead of Saturday's showdown with the Seahawks.

title: Sources: Bulls' Giddey out at least a few weeks
content: Bulls guard Josh Giddey will miss at least a few weeks after straining his left hamstring in Monday's loss to the Timberwolves, sources told ESPN.

title: Duke lands prized PG Rippey; '26 class now No. 1
content: Duke moved atop the 2026 recruiting class rankings after Deron Rippey Jr., the No. 3-ranked point guard in the country, became the Blue Devils' third five-star commitment.

content: While NBA players rock sneakers of various colors, the NFL has strict rules, and violators can incur hefty fines.

content: NIkola Jokic's knee injury puts him in jeopardy of missing too many games to qualify for the NBA MVP award.

content: Barcelona are interested in signing Juventus' Dusan Vlahovic as a potential replacement for Robert Lewandowski. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Early Week 18 bets: Ravens-Steelers to be a slugfest; Drake Maye for MVP
content: Which lines offered value once odds came out? Here are games we are eyeing for bets going into Week 18.

title: Gig workers‚Äô nationwide strike: why are they protesting?
content: Nationwide protests by quick e-commerce delivery workers disrupted services in several cities on December 31, raising concerns over delays and reduced availability of app-based deliveries during New Year celebrations.

title: Centre freezes Vodafone Idea‚Äôs AGR dues for five years
content: The Union government has a 49% equity stake in VIL. The freezing of the dues will ‚Äúensure competition in the sector and protect the interest of 20 crore VIL consumers,‚Äù an official said.

title: How Andhra Pradesh fared in 2025
content: We cover the state with articles talking about political controversies, maoist movements, road safety and other developments.

title: Kerala State Electricity Board invites bids for short-term power procurement to address summer demand surge
content: All power generators, including State utilities, captive power generators, distribution licencees and State-run electricity boards possessing valid trade licence, are qualified to participate in bidding process which will take place through Centre‚Äôs Discovery of Efficient Electricity Price portal

title: Syro-Malabar Church raises objections over alleged misrepresentation of ‚ÄòThe Last Supper‚Äô at Kochi Muziris Biennale
content: The work in question is a painting by artist Tom Vattakuzhy displayed as part of ‚ÄòEdam‚Äô exhibition at Garden Convention Centre in Kochi. The venue was shut down temporarily on Tuesday after protests by various groups

title: Zomato, Swiggy offer increased payout to gig workers amid strike call by unions on New Year's Eve
content: Zomato has offered delivery partners payouts of ‚Çπ120 to ‚Çπ150 per order during peak hours between 6 p.m. and 12 a.m. on New Year's Eve.

title: Over 2,500 nominations filed for BMC polls; 2,122 on last day
content: The elections to the BMC, which has 227 electoral wards, are scheduled to be held on January 15, and votes will be counted the next day

title: West Bengal in 2025: a year of religious polarisation
content: If year 2024 was the year of the protests over the gruesome rape and murder of a doctor at Kolkata‚Äôs R.G. Kar Medical College, the year 2025 saw an increase in politics of polarisation with construction of a temple, foundation stone for a mosque, and communal riots in Murshidabad

title: At Sivagiri, Kerala CM says those who create communal schisms betray Sree Narayana Guru‚Äôs teachings
content: Pinarayi Vijayan says communally divisive messaging plays into the hands of revanchist forces seeking to recreate the oppressive and hierarchical caste-based feudal society that Guru‚Äôs teachings helped dismantle

title: Woman 'gang-raped', thrown out of car in Faridabad; 2 held
content: The duo, who hail from Uttar Pradesh and Madhya Pradesh and are currently living in Faridabad, has been arrested, police said

title: J&K court acquits 3 accused tried for 'terror' activities
content: The three were arrested by police at a checkpost in the Batamaloo area of the city on October 10, 2022. The prosecution had alleged that they were found to have in their possession grenades and magazines with live rounds.

title: China's war mediation claim concerning, PM must respond: Congress
content: The Congress leader said our trade deficit is at a record high, and much of the country's exports are dependent on imports from China

title: New Year‚Äôs Eve in Bengaluru: All you need to know about traffic diversions, parking restrictions, metro and bus timings
content: With authorities expecting a massive turnout of over 10 lakh people this year, extensive crowd control and security measures have been put in place in high-footfall zones in Bengaluru city

title: Swabhimani Party extends support to MVA in Maharashtra civic polls
content: Sources within the Congress told The Hindu, ‚ÄúThere are a few places where the MVA is fighting together. Wherever there is a united MVA candidate, Swabhimani Paksha will support it.‚Äù

title: BJP slams Mamata for 'threatening' Amit Shah
content: Mamata Banerjee has threatened the Home Minister of India in words which cannot even be thought of. We have seen it. She said that you (Shah) are hiding in a hotel. If we want, you cannot step out of the hotel, says  BJP national spokesperson Sambit Patra

content: From Trump‚Äôs return to power to Operation Sindoor and SIR process, here are some of the major events that defined the world in 2025.

title: Assam man arrested in Kerala over alleged extremist social media posts
content: The accused, identified as Roshidul Islam, was arrested from Kaipamangalam police station limits in Thrissur. He had been living in the area for nearly two years and was working in a private firm, said police

title: Man gets life term for raising module of Pakistan based terror outfit in Assam
content: Md Kamruj Zaman alias Kamaruddin was awarded three separate punishments under provisions of an anti-terror law, with the maximum of life imprisonment, by an NIA special court in Guwahati, Assam

title: India imposes three-year tariff on some steel products after ‚Äòsudden, sharp‚Äô increase in imports
content: China, Vietnam, and Nepal will be subject to the levy; known as a safeguard duty, it be imposed at 12% in the ‚Äãfirst year followed by 11.5% in ‚Å†the second year and then 11% in the third year

title: Dense fog blankets Delhi, AQI stays in 'very poor' category
content: The national capital recorded a 24-hour average Air Quality Index (AQI) of 384, according to data from the Central Pollution Control Board (CPCB)

title: Prem Anand Sinha is Avadi Police Commissioner
content: Before being posted to South Zone, Mr. Sinha served in Chennai city as Additional Commissioner of Police, South

title: Panneerselvam slams DMK government over attack on Odisha man
content: Panneerselvam criticised the DMK government over the Tiruttani attack by four minors, alleging it exposed Tamil Nadu‚Äôs growing drug menace and urging urgent action.

content: He was the second Commissioner of Tambaram commissionerate, which was inaugurated on January 1, 2022¬†

content: The bus, operating a service under Budget Tourism Cell, from Malappuram depot was en route to Gavi in Pathanamthitta when the incident happened

title: When a poster row strained Jayalalithaa‚Äôs relationship with sections of Christians

title: Security Scare On New Year's Eve, Explosives-Laden Car Seized In Rajasthan
content: An explosives-laden car with150 kg of illegal ammonium nitrate concealed in bags of urea fertilizer was found in Rajasthan's Tonk on New Year's Eve today.

title: Video: Vande Bharat Sleeper Train Passes 'Water Test' At 180 Kmph
content: The Vande Bharat Sleeper train reached a speed of 180 kmph on the Kota-Nagda section during a safety and stability demonstration.

title: Who Is Greg Abel, Berkshire Hathaway's Next CEO After Warren Buffett
content: Greg Abel will become the CEO of Berkshire Hathaway on January 1, succeeding Warren Buffett, who is stepping down after a 60-year career.

title: Khaleda Zia Funeral Updates: Muhammd Yunus Reaches Parliament Complex For Last Rites
content: Khaleda Zia Funeral Updates: Former Bangladesh prime minister Khaleda Zia died on Tuesday after a prolonged illness. Her funeral will be held on Wednesday following Zohr prayers at Parliament's South Plaza and the adjoining Manik Mia Avenue

title: Heavily Drunk On New Year's Eve In Bengaluru? Police Will Drop You Home
content: Karnataka Home Minister G Parameshwara on Wednesday said that the state government will drop "heavily drunk" people to their homes amid New Year's Eve celebrations.

title: Silent Warriors On Kartavya Path: Indian Army To Showcase Camels, Indie Breed Dogs On Republic Day
content: India will witness a rare and powerful sight on Republic Day as animals of the Indian Army march proudly along Kartavya Path, symbolising endurance, sacrifice and Indias unique high-altitude military capability.

title: 30,000 Worshippers, One Spirit: Inside Delhi's Mega Christmas Celebration
content: Ankit Sajwan Ministries, a prominent church in New Delhi, hosted a Mega Christmas Celebration this week, drawing more than 30,000 worshippers.

title: Sena Leader Gets Nomination Papers In Crematorium, Beats Deadline By Minutes
content: A bizarre incident has happened in Maharashtra politics ahead of the state's civic body elections. A Shiv Sena (Eknath Shinde faction) leader, who was performing his mother's last rites, was given the election ticket right at the crematorium.

title: Faridabad Gang-Rape Horror: Van Caught On CCTV, Survivor In Trauma
content: CCTV visuals have emerged showing the van in which a 28-year-old Faridabad woman was gang-raped on Tuesday for over two hours before being thrown on the road.

title: Zomato, Swiggy Hike Gig Workers' Payout Amid Strike Call On New Year's Eve

title: Indian-Origin Adviser Rewarded Over Trump's "India-Pakistan Truce" Claim
content: Ranjit 'Ricky' Singh Gill, an Indian-origin adviser to US President Donald Trump, is grabbing headlines after being awarded for his supposed role in "India-Pakistan ceasefire negotiations" following Operation Sindoor earlier this year.

title: Woman Gang-Raped In Moving Van In Faridabad For 2 Hours, Thrown Out On Road
content: A 28-year-old woman was gangraped in a moving van in Faridabad for over two hours and then thrown on the road early on Tuesday.

title: Man Attempts To Attack Cop With Knife In Tamil Nadu, Video Goes Viral
content: A video showing a man attempting to attack a police constable with a knife during the Vaikunta Ekadesi festival in Tamil Nadus Tirupur district has gone viral on social media, triggering concern over safety during religious events.

content: A horrific incident has emerged from Assam, where a couple was killed after being burnt alive by a group of villagers on the suspicion of practising witchcraft in the Anlong district.

title: NFL futures: Seattle Seahawks enter Week 18 as Super Bowl favorites
content: Through 17 weeks of the NFL season, the  Seattle Seahawks  are the new favorites to win the Super Bowl 60, following the  Los Angeles Rams 's loss on "Monday Night Football." The Rams drop to second, as three NFC West teams sit in the top four. The AFC West-winning  Denver Broncos  have the third-best odds to win the Super Bowl at +700. The  San Francisco 49ers  at +850 and the AFC East champion  New England Patriots  at +900. The Seahawks and 49ers meet in Week 18. Note: Odds by  DraftKings Sportsbook  and subject to change.
